15#ifndef BIND9_CHECK_H
16#define BIND9_CHECK_H 1
17
18/*! \file bind9/check.h */
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21#include <isc/types.h>
22
23#include <isccfg/cfg.h>
24
25#ifndef MAX_MIN_CACHE_TTL
26#define MAX_MIN_CACHE_TTL 90
27#endif /* MAX_MIN_CACHE_TTL */
28
29#ifndef MAX_MIN_NCACHE_TTL
30#define MAX_MIN_NCACHE_TTL 90
31#endif /* MAX_MIN_NCACHE_TTL */
32
33#ifndef MAX_MAX_NCACHE_TTL
34#define MAX_MAX_NCACHE_TTL 7 * 24 * 3600
35#endif /* MAX_MAX_NCACHE_TTL */
36
37ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
38
39isc_result_t
40bind9_check_namedconf(const cfg_obj_t *config, bool check_plugins,
41 isc_log_t *logctx, isc_mem_t *mctx);
42/*%<
43 * Check the syntactic validity of a configuration parse tree generated from
44 * a named.conf file.
45 *
46 * If 'check_plugins' is true, load plugins and check the validity of their
47 * parameters as well.
48 *
49 * Requires:
50 *\li config is a valid parse tree
51 *
52 *\li logctx is a valid logging context.
53 *
54 * Returns:
55 * \li #ISC_R_SUCCESS
56 * \li #ISC_R_FAILURE
57 */
58
59isc_result_t
60bind9_check_key(const cfg_obj_t *config, isc_log_t *logctx);
61/*%<
62 * Same as bind9_check_namedconf(), but for a single 'key' statement.
63 */
64
65ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
66
67#endif /* BIND9_CHECK_H */
68
